subcategories.label: Whiskey
subcategories.description: A distilled alcoholic beverage made from fermented grain mash.

subcategories.label: Wine
subcategories.description: An alcoholic beverage made from fermented grapes.

subcategories.label: Beer
subcategories.description: An alcoholic beverage made from fermented grains.

subcategories.label: Gin
subcategories.description: A distilled alcoholic beverage flavored with juniper berries.

subcategories.label: Rum
subcategories.description: A distilled alcoholic beverage made from sugarcane byproducts.

subcategories.label: Vodka
subcategories.description: A distilled alcoholic beverage made from fermented grains or potatoes.

subcategories.label: Champagne
subcategories.description: A sparkling wine produced in the Champagne region of France.

subcategories.label: Cognac
